KeCert Configurator

Discover the New

In the constantly evolving world of digital training, blockchain certificates represent a historic breakthrough.

Thanks to innovative solutions like KeCert®, provided by Kedos S.r.l., it's finally possible to certify diplomas and attestations securely, transparently, and verifiably, without the need for intermediaries.

The blockchain is a shared and immutable digital ledger, ideal for safeguarding valuable data such as academic qualifications, credentials, and certifications. Each certificate becomes a unique digital token, marked by a timestamp and encryption, ensuring authenticity and preventing fraud.

Customize your software for issuing blockchain certificates. Choose the features you need, compare options, and create the perfect solution for your business.

What is a Blockchain?

The blockchain is a public, shared and immutable ledger in which each transaction corresponds to the writing of a new block in the chain.

Each block contains both the information to be recorded and the date and time of the transaction. A new block is added as the last one in the chain, with no possibility to alter existing blocks or insert between two consecutive blocks.

It was originally created for the transfer of Bitcoin, the first cryptocurrency. The information is grouped into blocks. Each block is linked to the previous and the next one, like a chain. That’s where the name Blockchain comes from!

Each block must be validated. To do this, there are dedicated systems (called miners) that solve complex mathematical problems. Once a block is validated, the miner immediately moves on to validate the next one.

Learn more >

The Advantages of KeCert®

Advanced Security

Each certificate is tracked on Ethereum, based on the Blockcerts standard developed by MIT, to which Kedos actively contributes.

Instant Verification

Students, institutions, and recruiters can authenticate diplomas with one click, without intermediaries.

Full Control

The educational institution retains ownership of the information throughout the entire certificate lifecycle.

Efficiency & Savings

The process is fast, streamlined, cost-effective, and ensures long-term digital preservation.

Total Flexibility

Use it anywhere: from your CV to LinkedIn, from recruiting platforms to international universities.
